ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three Planetary Romance
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Crisis on Infinite Betties goes interplanetary romance when Bettieâ€™s next dimensional leap finds her wearing the tiara, and carrying the sword, of a Princess of Mars! The Great Old Ones are shattering reality itself, and only the Beauty with the Bangs can keep their grubby tentacles off our mulitiverse!
